cards.title: Celtic Guardian
cards.description: An elf who learned to wield a sword, he baffles enemies with lightning-swift

cards.title: Dark Magician
cards.description: The ultimate wizard in terms of attack and defense.

cards.title: Blue-Eyes White Dragon
cards.description: This legendary dragon is a powerful engine of destruction. Virtually invincible, very few have faced this awesome creature and lived to tell the tale.
